questions.question_text: True or False: Some queries can be answered through the metadata cache and do not require an active Virtual Warehouse.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Some aggregate queries are answered thru micro partitions metadata only not requiring any VW spin ups.
Yes,It is True
correct answer:A

Selected Answer: A
Metadata queries can be done as metadata is stored in the services layer and does not require the compute layer to spin up a vm to access the storage layer.
Since Metadata cache and the Query Result cache are part of the Cloud Services Layer, they can run without the need of an active virtual warehouse

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

There is metadata cache in the service layer, so answer A is correct.

choices.B: Extracts the path of the flattened data
choices.C: Joins information outside the object with the flattened data
choices.A: Casts the values of the flattened data
choices.D: Retrieves a single instance of a repeating element in the flattened data

discussion.content:
C. is correct 
Joins information outside the object with the flattened data
